QuestData.Title: Stormsong Valley
QuestData.Description: The Kul Tiran fleet has been lost at sea. The tidesages of Stormsong, with their mystical oceanic magic, may be our only way to locate the fleet of legend.
QuestData.LogDescription: Offer to investigate the missing Kul Tiran fleet.
QuestData.RewardText: Even under normal circumstances, the tidesages would be wary of outsiders. I'll accompany you on this mission and maybe we can finally get some answers.
